metadata.title: AI Platform Demo
metadata.description: Walkthrough of agent creation on an AI platform

steps.narration: Welcome to the AI Platform. This is the main dashboard showing key metrics and activity.
Let's navigate to the Agents page where we can manage our AI agents.
Click the Create button to start building a new agent.
Enter the agent name. We'll call this one Customer Support Agent.

steps.value: Handles customer inquiries and provides support using knowledge base and tools.
steps.narration: Add a description that explains what this agent does.
Save the agent configuration. The agent is now ready for use.
Next, let's look at the Workflows page where we can create automated pipelines.
This concludes our demo of the AI Platform. Thank you for watching.
